blueprint.description: Installs Juju (a deployment tool created by Canonical) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Juju](https://juju.is/) is a Charmed Operator Framework, composed of a Charmed Operator Lifecycle Manager, and the Charmed Operator SDK. It allows you to deploy, integrate, and manage Kubernetes, container, and VM-native applications seamlessly across hybrid clouds. Juju drives Day 0 through Day 2 operations in your complex environment.
blueprint.name: Juju
blueprint.title: Juju
